title: Update APK download default filename to v20 and align downloads README

requirements.summary: Change /apk-download to default to the Version 20 APK filename when no filename query parameter is provided, and ensure generated links use that default.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /apk-download with no query parameters shows the default filename as strager-marketplace-v20.apk.
The generated direct download URL uses /downloads/strager-marketplace-v20.apk by default.
The generated shareable page link uses /apk-download?filename=strager-marketplace-v20.apk by default.

file_operations.description: Update the no-query-parameter default APK filename from strager-marketplace-v1.apk to strager-marketplace-v20.apk, ensuring the rendered filename, direct download URL, and shareable page URL all reflect the v20 default. Also update any developer-instruction examples on the page that currently reference the v1 APK so they match the new default.

requirements.summary: Update developer documentation under frontend/public/downloads/README.txt to reflect the Version 20 default APK filename used by /apk-download and align examples.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/downloads/README.txt includes Version 20 as the current default APK example (e.g., strager-marketplace-v20.apk).
Any README examples for /apk-download and direct /downloads/ links use strager-marketplace-v20.apk (unless explicitly describing historical examples).

file_operations.description: Revise the README to reflect that the current default APK filename used by /apk-download is strager-marketplace-v20.apk, and update any /apk-download and /downloads/ examples that currently reference strager-marketplace-v1.apk to use strager-marketplace-v20.apk (unless intentionally documenting older versions).
